description.value: Minotaurs are bipedal beings reminiscent of humans, though unlike humans they have a head resembling a bull's, hooved feet, and a covering of short, bovine fur. Minotaur fur generally comes in shades of brown, white, black, or a mixture of those colors. Regardless of whether they are male or female, the head of a minotaur is adorned with a formidable pair of bull-like horns. Their bodies also tend to have a larger build than humans, with the average minotaur sharing a height with some of the tallest humans.

system.classDetails:
Core Minotaur Traits

  • Compatibility: Bestial
  • Attribute Increase: Your Strength and Constitution scores both increase by 1.
  • Lifespan: Minotaurs reach adulthood in their mid-teens and few live past 80 years of age.
  • Size: Medium; Minotaur height generally ranges from 5 and a half to 7 feet tall, and their weight ranges from below 150 lbs. to 275 lbs. or more.
  • Speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
  • Horns: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.KE1XK9SLI0D93UHX]{Horns (Minotaur)}
  • Bull Rush: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.LGWWYVXE4UCUIR9I]{Bull Rush}
  • Trailblazer: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.HL7IFX1LMPKKB7LJ]{Trailblazer}
  • Bestial Creature: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.A69S7OIOQPX7A5GA]{Bestial Creature}
  • Languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Landspeak.
